The whole device tunnel option is available for your device.

With this option, all of your Internet traffic for all apps including all browsers will be tunneled through Psiphon.

Alternatively, you can choose to tunnel only the bundled Psiphon browser which will leave all other apps going directly through your standard Internet connection.
